recommendations: Harold Marchand
Sr. Scrum Master at Charles Schwab
October 13, 2015, Harold reported directly to Monica

I worked with and reported through Monica at Wayne Fueling Systems.  In just over a year Monica has led an Agile transformation across a global organization.  All of our engineers are members of scrum teams, and each team has defined scrum masters and product owners and utilize industry standard ceremonies and artifacts.  Wayne Fueling Systems is a uniquely challenging environment for a transformation.  Wayne products have many layers of hardware and software dependencies, both internal and external. In addition Wayne products have to pass through numerous levels of third party functional and security certification and many products require physical manufacturing.Monica has contributed to a wide variety of improvements including (but not limited to) definition of a standardized bug handling process, implementation of scrum and kanban workflows, new project inception workflows, and creation of community practice groups for software process, product owners, and scrum masters.Monica is very responsible and has a strong work ethic.  She takes the time to read agile blogs and books and shares key findings with the rest of her team and organization.  She has a very positive attitude that helps her drive change without alienating her colleagues.  She was well liked and widely respected and I would recommend her for any organization that is moving towards an agile transformation.
Harold Marchand
Sr. Scrum Master at Charles Schwab

Katie Childress, CSP, CSM
Sr. Scrum Master at WP Engine
October 8, 2015, Katie reported directly to Monica

Monica is nothing short of an agile miracle worker who commands the deep respect of the teams she transforms and the ScrumMasters she mentors. She's the perfect blend of knowledgeable and curious, of supportive and motivating, and of poised and approachable. We may not work together anymore, but I’m convinced that I’m not done learning from her yet.
Katie Childress, CSP, CSM
